title: Approval notification can't be sent due to a missing argument
content:
Notification with the Send manager a reminder that an approval task is pending template can't be sent. The following error message is seen in the maas_error.log file:

The error is [active_delegates_names should receive 3 arguments: key,delegatorId,parentEntityType]

Cause

The out-of-the-box template Studio > Task > Notifications > Send manager a reminder that an approval task is pending misses a comma. 

Resolution

You can manually correct the template by changing the following line from:

<%=active_delegates_names(${:entity.Assignee.Id},${:entity.ParentEntityType})%>

to:

<%=active_delegates_names(,${:entity.Assignee.Id},${:entity.ParentEntityType})%>

Related topics

For more information, see Show delegated user rule.
